parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The transmission hesitation and power loss can cause the vehicle to lose power and RPMs, leading to dangerous situations, such as accidents or loss of control, especially when merging or changing lanes.
symptoms: The vehicle hesitates when taking off from a standstill or switching lanes from a stop
the transmission struggles to shift
the vehicle has no power or RPMs
the Torque Converter fails to engage properly.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Delayed Recall Repair for Transmission Issue
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The delay in repairing the transmission issue can lead to continued safety risks and potential accidents due to the faulty transmission.
symptoms: None reported
as the issue is related to the delay in repairing the transmission problem.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The reprogramming of the transmission can cause unintended consequences, such as decreased fuel economy and warning lights, which can lead to further safety issues and concerns.
symptoms: Decreased fuel economy
warning lights appearing on the dashboard
transmission malfunction.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Poor Welding Quality in Crash Bar
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the crash bar weld can compromise the structural integrity of the vehicle, potentially leading to safety risks in the event of an accident.
symptoms: Rattling noise in the dash
broken crash bar weld in the dash
concerns about the safety implications of poorly done welds during production.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The transmission defect can cause the vehicle to roll away, potentially leading to accidents or injuries.
symptoms: Transmission in Park
notice from Nissan indicating that the truck could roll away.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The electrical system malfunction can cause distractions while driving, potentially leading to accidents or injuries.
symptoms: Radio turns on and off repeatedly after starting the vehicle
no warning lights or messages appear
cell phone Bluetooth connectivity issues.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure to properly inspect and repair defects can lead to safety risks and inconvenience to the vehicle owner.
symptoms: AC line issues
leaf in the right blower motor
and other defects discovered after purchase
despite the vehicle being certified pre-owned and having passed a 167-point inspection.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Defective engine mounts can cause excessive engine vibration, noise, and movement, which can lead to premature wear on engine components, reduced vehicle performance, and decreased driver comfort.
symptoms: Excessive engine vibration
loud engine noise
engine movement or rocking
rough idling
difficulty shifting gears
clunking or knocking sounds from the engine area.
